title: Bank of India ups MCLR by 0.10% from June 10 for various tenors
content: New Delhi, Jun 8 () Following peers, state-owned Bank of India has hiked lending rates based on MCLR by 0.10 per cent for various tenors. The bank has increased MCLR rates by 10 bps (or 0.10 per cent) for various tenors, it said in a statement.
